scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && vite build --mode production
scripts.build:staging: npm run clean && vite build --mode staging
scripts.test: npm run test:integration && npm run test:unit
scripts.deploy: firebase use staging && npm run build && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:staging: firebase use staging && npm run build:staging && firebase deploy --only hosting:staging
scripts.deploy:prod: firebase use prod && npm run build:prod && firebase deploy --only hosting:prod
scripts.deploy:functions: firebase use staging && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:functions:prod: firebase use prod && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:rules:prod: firebase use prod && copy firestore.rules.prod firestore.rules && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules
